sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import './add.css' const Add = () => { const [incresecount,setincresecount]=useState(0) const location=useLocation() const passeddata=location.state function increse(){ setincresecount(incresecount+1) } function decrese(){ setincresecount(incresecount-1) } return (

TITLE:{passeddata.title}

{passeddata.discription}

Price: {passeddata.price}

{incresecount}/>
) } export default Add
